components.3: Add portraits for non-joinable NPCs in BG1:EE.
components.4: Add portraits for non-joinable NPCs in BG2:EE

en_US.description: A version of PaintBG for EE games, this mod modifies certain NPC portraits, assigns [Artastrophe](https://artastrophe.deviantart.com) portraits to NPCs who didn't have any, etc...

fr_FR.description: Version de PaintBG pour les jeux EE, ce mod modifie certains portraits de PNJ, attribue des portraits de [Artastrophe](https://artastrophe.deviantart.com) à des PNJ qui n'en avaient pas, etc...

zh_CN.description: 这是 PaintBG 的EE游戏版本，这个模组修改了一些NPC的肖像，为没有肖像的NPC分配了[Artastrophe](https://artastrophe.deviantart.com)的肖像，等等...
